query: src.process.name contains ('regsvr32.exe', 'rundll32.exe') && src.process.user contains 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' && UrlAction == 'GET'

event.type = 'Duplicate Process Handle' && tgt.process.image.path contains '\\winlogon.exe' && !(src.process.image.path contains ('\\system32\\smss.exe', '\\system32\\lsm.exe', '\\system32\\svchost.exe', '\\system32\\csrss.exe', '\\WerFault.exe', 'c:\\Program files', 'CreativeCloudSet-Up.exe', 'Creative_Cloud_Set-Up.exe', 'GoToAssistTools64.exe')) && src.process.pid != '4'

src.process.name contains 'autoit3.exe' && (indicator.name contains ('ProcessHollowingSystemSigned', 'ParallelNtDllLoad', 'RemoteInjection', 'SuspiciousKeylogging', 'StartupFile') || (osSrc.process.name contains ('vbc.exe', 'regasm.exe', 'systeminfo.exe') && dst.port.number in ('80', '443', '8080')) || tgt.file.path contains ('AutoIt3.exe', '.au3') || src.process.dnsCount > 1 )
event.type = 'IP Connect' && event.network.direction = 'OUTGOING' && src.process.user = 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' && src.process.cmdline contains 'wermgr.exe'
